column5: Hawaii to get the worst of it...get to high ground!! Vancouver not expected to be too bad. 8.8 Earthquake hits Chile http://wcatwc.arh.noaa.gov/2010/02/27/7252...ge725245-10.htm
yea, i was just watchin the weather network when i heard about it.... im sure we'll hear about it from the west coast.
Heard Hawaii has warnings up.   Supposed to hit around 4:15pm EST
There is a tsunami wave moving at 500 Mph set to reach Hawaii in the next 10 minutes.

I have some family vacationing in New Zealand but luckily they are on NZ's west coast side facing Australia and shouldn't be affected by it too much.  Update:  We have made contact with our family in the area. They had registered with the Canadian consulate after arriving in NZ 3 weeks ago. The Canadian consulate contacted them via email to warn them of the coming tsunami. They have since moved inland to higher ground. They said that before they were contacted they had not heard anything about an incoming tsunami from local sources. The local NZ population is going about their Sunday business as usual with an apparent disregard for these events.
anyone have or know where to get updates about this tsunami???
CNN has been sitting ont he subject all day....even got BJ Penns webcam supplying footage
